name: Moving Out Game
description:
Let your creativity run wild in this imaginative and original decorating game 'Moving Out'. Enjoy the stress-free unboxing game.
As you set foot into the living room, a familiar scent greets your nostrils. But wait! It’s somehow different from what you’re used to. Ah yes, it’s the fragrance of a new home.

This is it. You’re finally at the end of your move. It’s time to confront the final step: unboxing

For most people, unboxing can be just as stressful as preparing for a move. Don’t worry, though. It’s not as bad as you might think. This stress-fee ASMR game will change your mind about unboxing.
Enjoy the best relaxing game with the soothing music and smooth gameplay.
Customise your home decoration and express your creativity, from the most classical to the trendiest.
This Unboxing game will let you live out your interior design fantasies in a fun and relaxing environment.
